title: MD
biography: Alexander Leonidovich Gintsburg is a Soviet and Russian microbiologist. Since 1997, he has been the director of the Gamaleya Research Institute of Epidemiology and Microbiology. He is Jewish.
aiSummary: Alexander Gintsburg is a microbiology specialist with an H-index of 8 at Gamaleya Research Institute (Member). Has been published in Journal of biomedical science, International journal of molecular sciences. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
knowsAbout: Hero of Labor of the Russian Federation
